titleStmt.title: Advertisement be [sic] Agnes Campbel relict of the deceast Master William Guthrie, minister of the Gospel, unto whose hands some printed papers called sermons, bearing the said Master William his name, may come.
titleStmt.author: Campbel, Agnes.

notesStmt.note: Refutation of published sermons which were attributed to William Guthrie.
Reproduction of original in the Edinburgh University Library.
